attributes.action: For all MP's and ministrial people within the uk govenment to take a pay cut
attributes.additional_details: For all MP's, ministers and lords within the UK govenment to take between a 10% - 20% paycut. The money will then be used to help families who are struggling during lockdown.
attributes.background: With the country being in lockdown many people and families aren't getting any support or income. I think that while the country is in lockdown all MP's and ministers/Lords within the UK government should take a paycut. The money saved should then be given to struggling families.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The Independent Parliamentary Standards Authority (IPSA) is responsible for deciding on MPs' expenses and pay. IPSA is independent of both Parliament and Government.

You can find out how to contact IPSA here:
http://www.theipsa.org.uk/about-us/contact-us/

You may wish to sign this petition:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/554400
